resources.string: Emergency Alerted in Real Time, Feel safe!
Add a photo of the incident:
Select the type of the incident:
Report an emergency that is happening where you are now.
Are you sure you want to submit this incident?
This permission is needed to know the location of emergency.
Something went wrong when uploading the image. Please, try submitting the form again.
Please, fill in all the fields with *.

.
This is an Emergency Alert App.
Here, you can get notified when an emergency is near you, view the ongoing alerts and statistics about previous emergencies.
You can also add an emergency event when it happens close to you.

. Here you can see all the ongoing emergency events.
Please, strictly follow the instructions of authorities, for your safety.
. Here you can see all the times you were notified for an emergency, by type of incident.
You have no alerts for this category.

string.name: fire_text
string.br: Fire approaching your area. Evacuate immediately\! Choose the safest road and avoid driving near fire. Remain on alert and follow the guidelines of the Authorities at any given moment. Get informed about protective action guidelines: https://civilprotection.gov.gr/odigies-prostasias/dasikes-pyrkagies

string.name: flood_text
string.br: Flooding is expected in your area. Move to a higher ground. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order. Never drive through flooded roads. Remain on alert and follow the guidelines of the Authorities at any given moment. Get informed about protective action guidelines: https://civilprotection.gov.gr/odigies-prostasias/plimmyres

string.name: tornado_text
string.br: Tornado warning in your area. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Do not attempt to travel. Move to the closest shelter to protect yourself from flying debris. Remain on alert and follow the guidelines of the Authorities at any given moment. Get informed about protective action guidelines: https://civilprotection.gov.gr/odigies-prostasias/thyellodeis-anemoi

string.name: earthquake_text
string.br: Earthquake at your location. Drop down to your hands and knees. Find a table or desk to hide under and hold onto. If you can\'t find a table, cover the back of your neck with your hands. Remain on alert and follow the guidelines of the Authorities at any given moment. Get informed about protective action guidelines: https://civilprotection.gov.gr/odigies-prostasias/seismoi

string.name: heatwave_text
string.br: High temperatures expected in your area. Drink plenty of water and take cooling measures. Check of your neighbors, especially the elders and children. Avoid physical exercise outdoors. Remain on alert and follow the guidelines of the Authorities at any given moment. Get informed about protective action guidelines: https://civilprotection.gov.gr/odigies-prostasias/kaysonas

string.name: thunderstorm_text
string.br: Thunderstorm in progress in your area. Destructive winds. Take shelter in a sturdy building away from windows. Remain on alert and follow the guidelines of the Authorities at any given moment. Get informed about protective action guidelines: https://civilprotection.gov.gr/odigies-prostasias/kataigides

string.name: blizzard_text
string.br: Blizzard in progress in your area. Take heating measures. Ensure water supply. Do not attempt to travel. Remain on alert and follow the guidelines of the Authorities at any given moment. Get informed about protective action guidelines: https://civilprotection.gov.gr/odigies-prostasias/hionoptoseis-pagetos

resources.string: You have no ongoing alerts. You are safe!
